casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
ANTWON W. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 4, 2018 Peter Tsimbidaros, in support of the petition. Michele C. Lukban, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 668 , 181 A.3d 144 (2018), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
